highlights: Revenue up 8% YoY driven by loyalty memberships; inventory days improved by 4.
Liquefied natural gas margins widened as contract repricing offset lower spot demand.
Loan book grew 11% with non-performing loans at 1.9%; CET1 ratio stable at 13.5%.
Datacenter GPU shipments doubled YoY; gross margin expanded 220 bps on richer product mix.
Container volumes fell 5% but long-term contracts cushioned spot rate volatility; leverage reduced to 1.8x EBITDA.
Diagnostics and specialty care segments drove margin expansion; free cash flow covered 120% of dividends.
Backlog reached a record high; pricing actions offset input cost inflation and preserved margins.
Cloud ARR grew 32% YoY; net dollar retention remained above 120% despite slower seat expansion.
Occupancy in logistics assets rose to 97%; office exposure reduced to 18% of portfolio NOI.
